game.title: The Lost Temple Treasure
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient treasure hidden within the lost temple.
game.description: The local villagers have been plagued by misfortune, and rumors suggest that an ancient treasure lies within a long-abandoned temple deep in the jungle. Your quest is to retrieve this treasure and bring it back to the village.

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location and layout.
task.description: Speak to the local guides and gather maps or clues that will aid you in your journey. This may involve completing small tasks or quests for them.

task.objective: Reach the lost temple and navigate its traps and puzzles.
task.description: Use your wits to overcome obstacles and challenges within the temple. Be prepared for danger, as the treasure may be guarded by powerful entities.

task.objective: Retriev the ancient treasure from its resting place.
task.description: Solve the final puzzle or challenge to claim the treasure. Be cautious, as this may require great skill and bravery.
